00006   void compile_it(uv_work_t* req) {
00007     sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w = (sass_context_wrapper*)req->data;
00008 
00009     if (ctx_w->dctx) {

00029   void sass_free_context_wrapper(sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w) {
00030     if (ctx_w->dctx) {
00031       sass_delete_data_context(ctx_w->dctx);
00032     }
00033     else if (ctx_w->fctx) {
00034       sass_delete_file_context(ctx_w->fctx);
00035     }
00036 
00037     delete ctx_w->error_callback;
00038     delete ctx_w->success_callback;
00039 
00040     ctx_w->result.Reset();
00041 
00042     free(ctx_w->include_path);
00043     free(ctx_w->linefeed);
00044     free(ctx_w->out_file);
00045     free(ctx_w->source_map);
00046     free(ctx_w->source_map_root);
00047     free(ctx_w->indent);
00048 
00049     std::vector<CustomImporterBridge *>::iterator imp_it = ctx_w->importer_bridges.begin();
00050     while (imp_it != ctx_w->importer_bridges.end()) {
00051       CustomImporterBridge* p = *imp_it;
00052       imp_it = ctx_w->importer_bridges.erase(imp_it);
00053       delete p;
00054     }
00055     std::vector<CustomFunctionBridge *>::iterator func_it = ctx_w->function_bridges.begin();
00056     while (func_it != ctx_w->function_bridges.end()) {
00057       CustomFunctionBridge* p = *func_it;
00058       func_it = ctx_w->function_bridges.erase(func_it);
00059       delete p;
00060     }
